card.name: Glyph
card.property: +1 Power

card.name: Wand
card.property: +1 Power. Attack: Deal 1 damage to target player. If they die from this damage, draw 2 cards.

card.name: Limp Wand
card.property: (No effect.)

card.name: Fizzle
card.property: (No effect.)

card.name: Wild Magic
card.property: Choose 1: +2 Power OR you may play the top card of any foe's deck and then put it into their discard pile. If it's Ongoing, keep it instead.

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Each player may discard their hand and draw 2 cards. Each who does not gains a Limp Wand.

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Attack: Deal 6 damage to the strongest player(s).

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Attack: Each player reveals the top card of their deck. The player(s) revealing the highest cost card passes their card to the deiscard pile of the player(s) revealing the lowest cost card.

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Each player may pay 4HP to destroy a card in their hand. Use this any number of times.

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Attack: Each player totals the cost of cards in their hand. The player(s) with the highest total cost gains 2. Limp Wands.

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Attack: Each player reveals the top 2 cards of their deck. Destroy 1 and draw the other. Take damage equal to the cost of the card you draw.

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: The player(s) with the highest and lowest HP swap HP.

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Each player shuffles their hand, deck, and discard pile together, and then draws 5 cards.

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Attack: Each player destroys a random card in their hand, then gains a Wild Magic and puts it into their hand.

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Each player may gain the top card of the main deck. Each who does destroys the top card of their deck.

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Each player may destroy the highest cost card in their hand to heal 13 HP.

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Play 2 random Mayhem cards from the destroyed pile.

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Each player may destroy a card in their hand or discard pile. If that card has 1 or more VP, gain a number of cards from the top of the main deck equal to the VP value of that card. (*=3 VP)

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Attack: Each player puts all Glyphs from their discard pile on top of their deck.

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Each player reveals their hand and resolves each Attack in their hand against themselves.

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Attack: Deal 5 damage to each player with 10 or more HP.

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Resolve each Attack in the Line-Up. Active player targets effects that require it.

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Each player puts a Dead Wizard Token they control into a pile. Shuffle them, then give 1 at random back to each contributer. Resolve the text on the token you gain.

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Attack: The foe on your right may destroy a card in their hand and may destroy a card in their discard pile.

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Attack: The foe on your left draws 2 cards.

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Attack: Each player gains the top card of the main deck and takes damage equal to its cost.

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Attack: Deal 3 damage to each player with 10 or fewer HP.

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Resolve the current Legend's Group Attack.

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Each player totals the cost of cards in their hand. The player(s) with the lowest total draws 2 cards.

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Attack: Each player gains a Limp Wand and puts it on top of their deck.

card.name: Mayhem!
card.property: Attack: Each player discards an Ongoing card they control.

card.name: Annihilageddon Arena
card.property: Ongoing: Attacks you play deal double damage. Each time you kill a foe, put this into your discard pile.

card.name: Go-Mart
card.property: Ongoing: Your healing effects are doubled.

card.name: The Pleasure Palace
card.property: Ongoing: The first time you play a Spell during each of your turns, draw a card.

card.name: Murdershroom Marsh
card.property: Ongoing: The first time you play a Treasure during each of your turns, draw a card.

card.name: Castle Tentakill
card.property: Ongoing: The first time you play a Creature during each of your turns, draw a card.

card.name: Mt. Skullzfyre
card.property: Ongoing: The first time you play a Wizard during each of your turns, draw a card.

card.name: Doctor Extinction
card.property: Double your Power this turn. Group Attack: Each player discards all cards with cost 5 or greater.

card.name: Magus Jenny Jellybean
card.property: +4 Power. Attack: Deal 4 damage to target foe. Group Attack: Each player gains a Limp Wand for each card in their hand with cost 4 or greater.

card.name: Skullzor!! (Guitars Wailing)
card.property: Put each Spell from your discard pile into your hand. If none, +2 Power. Group Attack: Each player reveals their hand and takes 3 damage for each card with 1 or more VP. (*=3 VP)

card.name: Much Darker Lord Dark Lord
card.property: Put each Treasure from your discard pile into your hand. If none, +2 Power. Group Attack: Each player takes 7 damage.

card.name: Champion Chafia and Burning Kitty
card.property: +2 Power and draw a card. Destroy a Limp Wand in your hand and/or discard pile. Group Attack: Each player gains a Limp Wand for each Creature in the Line-Up.

card.name: The Cosmic Glyph
card.property: Resolve a random Mayhem from the destroyed pile. You may decline to participate. Group Attack: Each player discards 2 cards and 1 Ongoing card they control.

card.name: Papa Boner
card.property: +3 Power. Gain an additional random Wizard Ability tile until the next Legend is defeated. Group Attack: Each player loses HP until they match the HP of the weakest player.

card.name: Ciggy the Slow Death
card.property: +2 Power. Target foe gains a Limp Wand. (This is not an Attack.) Group Attack: Each player destroys cards in their hand until they have only 1 card of each type in their hand.

card.name: Blood Lord Krazztar
card.property: Draw 3 cards and take 3 damage. Group Attack: Each player puts a card from their hand into the discard pile of the foe on their left. Deal damage to that foe equal to double the cost of the card you gave them.

card.name: Lickity-Styx, Demon Wizard
card.property: Reveal the top card of the main deck and put it on top of your deck. If it's a Mayhem, +3 Power instead. Group Attack: Each player reveals the top 5 cards of their deck and discards each card with cost 1 or greater.

card.name: Ben-Nanamancer
card.property: +2 Power. Heal 1 HP for each Starter you control, in your hand, and in your discard pile. Group Attack: Each player takes 5 damage and gains a Limp Wand.

card.name: One-Eyed, One-Armed, One-Balled Willy
card.property: +1 Power. Draw 1 card. Unavoidable Attack: Deal 1 damage to each foe.

cards.card:
<property name="oversize_wizard" value="Venture The Party Dragon"
+2 Power. Draw 2 random Mayhems from the destroyed pile. Resolve 1 of them. You may decline to participate. Defense: You may discard this to avoid an Attack. If you do, draw a card and redirect the effect to the attacker.

<property name="oversize_wizard" value="Snotia the Viscous Viscountess"
+2 Power. Heal 6 HP. Defense: You may discard this to avoid an Attack. If you do, draw a card, heal 3 HP, and redirect the effect to the attacker.

<property name="oversize_wizard" value="Hellish Huffman and His Band of Rage"
+3 Power. If you have 3 or more Spells in your discard pile, additional +3 Power. Defense: You may discard this to avoid an Attack. If you do, draw a card and redirect the effect to the attacker.

<property name="oversize_wizard" value="Mcravey the Highland Magus"
+2 Power. Attack: Deal 2 damage to each foe for each Wizard you control and in your discard pile. Defense: You may discard this to avoid an Attack. If you do, draw a card and redirect the effect to the attacker.

<property name="oversize_wizard" value="Ball of Cthulhu"
+2 Power. Attack: Deal 7 damage to target foe. Defense: You may discard this to avoid an Attack. If you do, draw a card and redirect the effect to the attacker.

<property name="oversize_wizard" value="Joan of Spark"
+2 Power. Peek at the top 2 cards of your deck. You may destroy 1 of them. Defense: You may discard this to avoid and Attack. If you do, draw a card and redirect the effect to the attacker.

<property name="oversize_wizard" value="The Game-Over Lord"
+2 Power. At end of turn, put this card on the bottom of its owner's deck. Defense: You may put this on the bottom of your deck to avoid an Attack. If you do, draw a card and redirect the effect to the attacker.

<property name="oversize_wizard" value="Mr. Lucky and the Charms"
+3 Power. If you have 3 or more Treasures in your discard pile, additional +3 Power. Defense: You may discard this to avoid an Attack. If you do, draw a card and redirect the effect to the attacker.

<property name="oversize_wizard" value="Dungstar the Poo Pope"
+3 Power. You may destroy and replace a card in the Line-Up. Defense: You may discard this to avoid an Attack. If you do, draw a card and redirect the effect to the attacker. You may destroy a card in your hand.

<property name="oversize_wizard" value="Sir Kitty Purrington"
+2 Power. Attack: Deal 2 damage to each foe for each Creature you control and in your discard pile. Defense: You may discard this to avoid an Attack. If you do, draw a card and redirect the effect to the attacker.

<property name="oversize_wizard" value="Fey Ticklebottom"
+2 Power. Attack: Each foe gains a Limp Wand. Defense: You may discard this to avoid an Attack. If you do, draw a card and the attacker gains a Limp Wand.

<property name="oversize_wizard" value="Roachsauce"
+2 Power for each Dead Wizard Token you control. Defense: You may discard this to avoid an Attack. If you do, draw a card and redirect the effect to the attacker, and they take an additional 4 damage.

<property name="oversize_wizard" value="Studo Spellslammer and the Juice"
+2 Power. Attack: Deal 10 damage to each foe, but each foe takes 2 less damage for each Dead Wizard Token they control. Defense: You may discard this to avoid an Attack. If you do, draw a card and redirect the effect to the attacker.

card.name: Uncle Andy's Laurels
card.property: +5 Power.

card.name: Joy-Boy's Bag of Goodies
card.property: +3 Power. Reveal the top card of your deck. Heal HP equal to the cost of that card.

card.name: The Un-Holy Grail
card.property: +3 Power. Defense: You may discard this to avoid an Attack. If you do, draw a card and deal 5 damage to the attacker.

card.name: Dragon's Ballz
card.property: Heal 3 HP. Ongoing-Defense: You may discard this from play to avoid an Attack. If you do, draw a card. If you own both Dragon's Ballz cards, this card is worth 5 VP.

card.name: Battle Sax
card.property: +2 Power. Attack: Deal 5 damage to the foes on your left and right.

card.name: Overkill Grill
card.property: +2 Power. Attack: Deal 4 damage to each foe for each Legend in their discard pile. If this deals no damage, you may destroy a card in your hand.

card.name: Johnny's Rotten Staph
card.property: +1 Power. Attack: Deal 3 damage to target foe and they gain a Limp Wand.

card.name: Sexcalibur
card.property: Put a Wizard from your discard pile into your hand. If there aren't any, +2 Power.

card.name: Wand of Porkus
card.property: Draw a Card. Attack: Put a card with cost 0 from your hand or discard pile into target foe's hand.

card.name: Deep Shit
card.property: +2 Power. Attack: Each foe reveals the top card of their deck. You may discard any number of them.

card.name: Huge Boner
card.property: Ongoing: You are considered to control an additional Dead Wizard Token. This card is worth 1 VP for each actual Dead Wizard Token you control.

card.name: Golden Girls
card.property: Ongoing: At the start of each of your turns, heal 1 HP for each Ongoing you control.

card.name: Robotic Tongue
card.property: +1 Power. Defense: You may discard this to avoid an Attack. If you do, you may destroy a card in your hand or discard pile.

card.name: Furry Fury
card.property: Put a Creature from your discard pile into your hand. If there aren't any, +2 Power.

card.name: Lucky Day
card.property: Draw a card. Defense: You may discard this to avoid an Attack. If you do, draw a card and heal 3 HP.

card.name: Sin-Fection
card.property: +2 Power. Attack: Deal 5 damage to target foe.

card.name: Dragon Whored
card.property: +1 Power. You may destroy a card in your discard pile.

card.name: Inappropriatus Grab-O
card.property: +1 Power. Put the next card you buy or gain on top of your deck.

card.name: Mega-Fisting!
card.property: Attack: Deal 6 damage to the foe on your left or right.

card.name: Vomit Comet
card.property: Draw a card. Each time you buy or gain a card this turn, Attack: Deal damage to target foe equal to the cost of that card.

card.name: Stover-Heated
card.property: +4 Power.

card.name: Goregasm
card.property: If you control 3 or more Dead Wizard Tokens, draw 3 cards. Otherwise, +2 Power.

card.name: Mist Me Fucker
card.property: +2 Power. Defense: You may discard this to avoid an Attack. If you do, draw a card and deal 2 damage to the attacker.

card.name: Wizard Babies
card.property: +3 Power. Attack: Deal 2 damage to each foe for each Defense in their discard pile.

card.name: Annihilaggedon!
card.property: +3 Power. Attack: Deal 7 damage to each foe.

card.name: Necromancing
card.property: +3 Power. If you control a Huge Boner, you may Attack: Choose a Dead Wizard Token target foe controls, swap tokens with that foe, then resolve the text on those tokens.

card.name: Expando the Brain
card.property: +2 Power. Attack: Target foe discards a card with cost 5 or greater. If they avoid this, they take 5 damage.

card.name: Vee-Arr the Virtual Wiz
card.property: +2 Power. Defense: You may discard this to avoid an Attack. If you do, draw 2 cards, and then discard 1 of them.

card.name: Pythox LZR-WULF
card.property: +2 Power. Attack: Deal 5 damage to each weaker foe.

card.name: Sblendo the Dreamcrusher
card.property: Look at the top card of your deck. Draw it or destroy it.

card.name: Destiny's Child
card.property: +1 Power. If this is the first card you play this turn, discard your hand and draw 4 cards.

card.name: Abraca-Labrador
card.property: Draw a card. Heal 2 HP

card.name: Bossu Fishmonger
card.property: Put a Spell from your discard pile into your hand. If there aren't any, +2 Power.

card.name: Pustrualord Rippskull
card.property: +2 Power. Attack: Each foe discards a card.

card.name: Damsel Distressia
card.property: +2 Power. Attack: Target foe reveals the top card of their deck and takes damage equal to its cost.

card.name: Car-Lotta Familiars
card.property: +1 Power. You and target foe each draw a card. Defense: You may discard this to avoid an Attack.

card.name: Solzar the Wizard Star
card.property: +2 Power and draw a card. Attack: Deal 10 damage to target foe.

card.name: Fingler
card.property: +5 Power. -1 Power for each Dead Wizard Token you control.

card.name: Sugarpuss
card.property: Draw 2 cards, and then discard 1 card. Heal HP equal to the cost of the discarded card. If you are now at 25 HP, shuffle a Dead Wizard Token you control into the stack.

card.name: Not-Live Girls
card.property: +1 Power. Additional +1 Power for each Dead Wizard Token you control.

card.name: Boogie Knight
card.property: +2 Power.

card.name: Stabby Steve
card.property: +2 Power. Attack: Target foe reveals their hand and takes damage equal to the highest cost card revealed this way.

card.name: Sk8 Ratz
card.property: +2 Power. Defense: You may discard this to avoid an Attack. If you do, you may pass a card from your hand or discard pile to the attacker's discard pile.

card.name: Lucky's Charms
card.property: Put a Treasure from your discard pile into your hand. If there aren't any, +2 Power.

card.name: Acid Dragon
card.property: +1 Power. Look at the top card of your deck. Destroy it or leave it.

card.name: Fatality Fighter
card.property: +2 Power. Attack: Deal 4 damage to your weakest foe. If they die from this damage, reveal 2 Dead Wizard Tokens. You choose which 1 they gain.

card.name: Genital Harpies
card.property: +2 Power. Attack: Deal 2 damage to each foe for each Limp Wand you control and in your discard pile. If this deals no damage, draw a card.

card.name: The What?!
card.property: +2 Power. Attack: Deal 3 damage to each foe for each Ongoing you control.

card.name: The Twins
card.property: Draw 2 cards.

card.name: Fruity Rooty
card.property: +2 Power. Attack: Each foe gains a Limp Wand. For each foe who avoids this, heal 4 HP.

card.name: Cthulhu
card.property: While you own Cthulhu, you control the R'lyeh Standee. Unavoidable Attack: Each foe discards a random card and takes damage equal to the cost of that card.

card.name: BFG
card.property: +2 Power. Defense: You may discard this to avoid an Attack. If you do, draw a card and you may destroy a card in your hand.

card.name: Ability
card.property: Each time you play a Spell during your turn, look at the top card of your deck. You may discard it.

card.name: Ability
card.property: The second time you play a Treasure during your turn, you may put a card from your discard pile on top of your deck.

card.name: Ability
card.property: Cards with cost 4 or less you buy or gain from the Line-Up go to the top of your deck.

card.name: Ability
card.property: Each time you play a Creature during your turn, heal HP equal to its VP value.

card.name: Ability
card.property: If you play 2 or more different Wizards during your turn, +2 Power. If you play 2 or more different Creatures during your turn, +2 Power.

card.name: Ability
card.property: Once during each of your turns, you may pay 4 HP to draw a card.

card.name: Ability
card.property: At end of turn, draw an extra card for each Wizard you bought or gained during your turn.

card.name: Ability
card.property: If you play 4 or more different card types during your turn, +1 Power and draw a card.

card.name: Dead Wizard Token
card.property: Destroy a random card in your discard pile.

card.name: Dead Wizard Token
card.property: Gain a Limp Wand.

card.name: Dead Wizard Token
card.property: Destroy a random card in your hand.

card.name: Dead Wizard Token
card.property: Gain 2 Limp Wands.

card.name: Dead Wizard Token
card.property: Deal 8 damage to the Wizard who killed you.

card.name: Dead Wizard Token
card.property: Each foe may pass a card from their discard pile to yours.

card.name: Dead Wizard Token
card.property: Reveal, then pass the top card of your deck to target foe's hand.

card.name: Dead Wizard Token
card.property: Resolve the current Legend's Group Attack against yourself.

card.name: Dead Wizard Token
card.property: You respawn from this death with 11 HP.

card.name: Dead Wizard Token
card.property: Draw a card.

card.name: Dead Wizard Token
card.property: Discard 3 cards.

card.name: Dead Wizard Token
card.property: Destroy a card in your discard pile.

card.name: Dead Wizard Token
card.property: Discard 2 random cards.

card.name: Dead Wizard Token
card.property: Additional -4 VP.

card.name: Dead Wizard Token
card.property: Additional -2 VP.

card.name: Dead Wizard Token
card.property: You take 3 extra damage from Wand Attacks.

card.name: Dead Wizard Token
card.property: You pay 1 more to buy Wizards and Spells.

card.name: Dead Wizard Token
card.property: You pay 1 more to buy Creatures and Treasures.

card.name: Dead Wizard Token
card.property: You can't avoid Mayhem Attacks.

card.name: Dead Wizard Token
card.property: You pay 1 more to buy Legends and Wild Magics.
